## STAT447C: Bayesian Statistics

**Dates:** January 2024---April 2024

-   Master a set of tools flexible enough to address most data analysis issues: non-standard data types, non-iid, expert knowledge, etc.
-   Acquire hands-on experience with rapid prototyping of statistical models capturing uncertainty.
-   Face the limitations of the Bayesian approach and how to work around them.
